programme.desc: Directed by Annie Silverstein. With Rob Morgan, Amber Havard, Yolonda Ross, Keira Bennett. In a near-abandoned subdivision west of Houston, a wayward teen runs headlong into her equally willful and unforgiving neighbor, an aging bullfighter who's seen his best days in the arena; it's a collision that will change them both.

programme.title: Lansky
Lansky - Amerikanisches Roulette
programme.desc: Directed by John McNaughton. With Richard Dreyfuss, Yosef Carmon, Mosko Alkalai, Fima Noveck. Richard Dreyfuss stars in this compelling, fact-based movie about notorious mobster Meyer Lansky, chronicling his beginnings as a Jewish immigrant to his successful career in gambling, bootlegging and racketeering--and eventually murder.
programme.review: --- Actors: Richard Dreyfuss (role=Meyer Lansky), Yosef Carmon (role=Rabbi /), Mosko Alkalai (role=Jewelry Shopkeeper), Fima Noveck (role=Hasid in Grodno), Joshua Praw (role=Meyer Lansky Age 8), Bernard Hiller (role=Max Lansky), Jill Holden (role=Yetta Lansky), Larry Moss (role=Benjamin Lansky), Chris Marquette (role=Jake Lansky Ages 9-11), Ryan Merriman (role=Meyer Lansky Ages 12-14), Benjamin Kimball Smith (role=Irish Gang Leader), Brian Casey (role=Irish Boy #1)

programme.desc: Directed by Evgeniy Bedarev. With Anastasiya Abadzhidi, Dmitriy Bedarev, Dmitriy Belotzerkovskiy, Mikhail Bespalov. A single mother buys a flat in the Soviet high-rise in Moscow, one thing she doesn't know - there is a mythical creature - a home elf (Domovoy in Russian) - lives in the flat for ages. And he is against any new tenants. There is also a witch who was paid to get rid of the home elf buy an estate agent, so she could sell the flat.. and the witch learns there is a treasure hidden in the old flat. ...

programme.desc: Directed by Gilles de Maistre. With Daniah De Villiers, Mélanie Laurent, Langley Kirkwood, Ryan Mac Lennan. programme.desc: Directed by Gérard Jugnot. With Gérard Jugnot, Bérénice Bejo, Sabine Haudepin, Chantal Lauby. Yvon Rance, a born hairdresser and an elegant middle-aged man with a perfect toupee, reigns in his native Brittany over a clientèle of little old ladies. But his main reason for living, his masterpiece, is Laetitia, his only daughter, whom he has single-handedly brought up for eighteen years and whom he fondly pictures as heading a cutting-edge hairdressing salon.
